pkgmetadata.longdescription: Standardize Plant Names According to World Flora Online Taxonomic Backbone // World Flora Online is an online flora of all known plants, available from http://www.worldfloraonline.org/. Methods are provided of matching a list of plant names (scientific names, taxonomic names) against a static copy of the World Flora Online Taxonomic Backbone data that can be downloaded from the World Flora Online website.
